H0.text: In geometry, what name is given to a straight line from the circumference to the centre of a circle or sphere. Diameter

H1.text: In geometry, what name is given to a straight line from the circumference to the centre of a circle or sphere. Chord

H2.text: In geometry, what name is given to a straight line from the circumference to the centre of a circle or sphere. Tangent

H3.text: In geometry, what name is given to a straight line from the circumference to the centre of a circle or sphere. RADIUS

A4.text: In classical geometry, a radius (pl. : radii or radiuses) of a circle or sphere is any of the line segments from its center to its perimeter

A5.text: The diameter D is defined as twice the radius
